documents.document: RT @BryndenBFish: "Bolton has blundered." #CalmYourselfIn3Words
“Who fears to walk upon the grass? But it is the grass that hides the viper from his enemies until he strikes.” http://t.co/7RGaCbllOh

“Sorcery is a sword without a hilt. There is no safe way to grasp it.”
-Dalla #asoiaf http://t.co/LVVXU0US61
“You are my most able servant, Tywin,” the king said, “but a man does not marry his heir to his servant’s daughter.” http://t.co/V30jzgUQOW

There is no wine so sweet as wine taken from a foe. One day I shall drink your wine, Crow’s Eye, & take all that you hold dear.
-Victarion
The king summoned many closest to him to Summerhall, to celebrate the birth of his 1st great-grandchild, Rhaeghar... http://t.co/dVucA2o3Gz

“One day the other moon will kiss the sun, then it will crack & the dragons will return.”
#sun&stars #moonofmylife http://t.co/xyMW3szEzy

“I just want to stand on top of the Wall and piss off the edge of the world.”
-Tyrion Lannister #asoiaf http://t.co/JJsmEtgF4q

No, don’t, don’t cut my hair, Ned loves my hair. Then the steel was at her throat, its bite was red & cold.
-Catelyn http://t.co/VrdfJI2MwZ
“Sometimes I think I was born with the taste of fire in my mouth and a hole in my chest. Are you my mother, Thoros?” http://t.co/xl3d4sRfXO

“You will call me Brienne. Not wench.”
“My name is Ser Jaime. Not Kingslayer.”
“Do you deny you slew a king?”
“No. Do you deny your sex?”

“Did you come to talk or to fight?”
“I came to hear you confess.”
-Gregor Clegane & Oberyn Martell #asoiaf http://t.co/ayB3GHVxhd
“The first time we shared a bed, he called me by your sister’s name. He was on top of me, in me, stinking of wine, & he whispered Lyanna.”

“You think this is a jape?”
“I think life is a jape. Yours, mine, everyone’s.”
-Jorah & Tyrion #asoiaf http://t.co/GxUMHxTKfn

“Balon was mad, Aeron is madder, and Euron is maddest of them all.”

“Command them.”
“An invitation will accomplish the same thing. Power tastes best when sweetened by courtesy.” http://t.co/5TsZihvYpa

She’d tell him, “I missed you,” & he’d say it too at the very same moment, the way they always used to.
Arya #asoiaf http://t.co/WoWGvbtxsm

“You are going to fight that?” Ellaria said in a hushed voice.
“I am going to kill that,” he replied carelessly.” http://t.co/NHSyKoyvXX

“Better the butcher than the meat. All kings are butchers. Are queens so different?”
-Daario Naharis #asoiaf #books http://t.co/IgmKrIDki4

“The girl… Daenerys. Let her live. If it… not too late… don’t let them kill her. And help my son, Ned. Make him be…better than me.”
-Robert

“Words are like arrows, Arianne. Once loosed, you cannot call them back.”
-Doran Martell #asoiaf http://t.co/C1cp6EiEaW

“My father had a saying too. Never wound a foe when you can kill him. Dead men don’t claim vengeance.”
Jaime #asoiaf http://t.co/5mu39XOpsu
Enough Ned, I will hear no more. A direwolf is a savage beast…Get her a dog,she’ll be happier for it. #NationalDogDay http://t.co/O9hNN9pRDU

“You’re mine. Mine, as I’m yours. And if we die, we die. All men must die, Jon Snow. But first we’ll live”

“Ghost,” he whispered. -Jon Snow (ADWD)

“You need a woman now. Nothing like a woman after a man’s been blooded.”
Tyrion glanced over to Lady Stark, “I’m willing if she is.”

Remember who you are,what you were made to be. Remember your words.
"Fire & Blood," Daenerys told the swaying grass. http://t.co/27R0dd7vbA

The privy stink gave ample evidence the oft-repeated jape about his father was a lie.
Lord Tywin Lannister did not, in the end, shit gold.
“In my dreams, I kill him every night,” Robert admitted. “A thousand deaths will still be less than he deserves.” http://t.co/RiFltDSo8j

Only a fool would ever claim she was more beautiful than I. The world was full of fools, however.
-Cersei #asoiaf http://t.co/uvfUPxyf4I

“Sometimes I think everyone is just pretending to be brave, & none really are. Maybe pretending is how you get brave, I don’t know.”
-Grenn

“All men are fools, if truth be told, but the ones in motley are more amusing than ones with crowns.”

“In my dreams I always have two hands.” He stared uncomprehending at his stump.
“We all dream of things we cannot have.”
-Jaime & Joanna

-Arlan

The Smith he labors day & night, to put the world of men to right. With hammer, plow & fire bright, he builds for little children. #LaborDay

The magister waggled his fat fingers. “Some contracts are writ in ink, & some in blood. I say no more.”
-Illyrio http://t.co/ezZNDzWS4O
“An admiral without ships, a hand without fingers, in service to a king without a throne. Is this a child’s riddle?” http://t.co/IEZRvspcow

“A pity Lord Tywin Lannister never had a son. I could have been the heir he wanted, but I lacked the cock.”
-Cersei http://t.co/nZymudTnD6
Sansa could feel the snow on her lashes, taste it on her lips. It was the taste of Winterfell. The taste of innocence. The taste of dreams.

“Go pray to your Red God, light your fire, & tell me what you see.”
“I see dragons.”
-Victarion & Moqorro #TWOW http://t.co/YRSiZ9p5ob

“Changes will be made. I meant to do it long ago, but… well, it does no good to speak of roads not taken.”
-Rhaegar http://t.co/j9MoZtjNWd

“When you know what a man wants you know who he is, and how to move him.”
-Petyr Baelish #asoiaf http://t.co/svOAEartoI
“A woman’s life is 9 parts mess to 1 part magic…&the parts that look like magic often turn out the messiest of all.” http://t.co/47FlUDHlvO

“The strongest trees are rooted in the dark places of the earth… Darkness will make you strong.”
-Bloodraven #asoiaf http://t.co/gdDIm7JpKv

“You poor stupid blind crippled fool… I am the monster they all say I am. Yes, I killed your vile son.”
-Tyrion http://t.co/Lp4nNFJSrx

“Silver’s sweet and gold’s our mother, but once you’re dead they’re worth less than that last shit you take as you lie dying.”
-Ben Plumm
